post:
Hello,
We are providing high quality web hosting services since 2017.
Our servers are located in Germany.

**Our servers Specifications :**


* AMD RYZEN 3600 / Intel Core i9-9900K
* 2TB NVMe Drives
* 128 GB Ram
* DDoS Protected Network


**Our shared hosting services are Layer 7 / 4 DDoS Protected**
**We use cPanel / Cloudlinux for all our servers**


**What plans do we offer ?**

Basic Plan

* 2GB Storage
* 50GB Bandwidth
* 100% NVMe Disk
* Unlimited Email Accounts
* Unlimited FTP Accounts
* Unlimited Databases
* Unlimited Hosted Domain
* Free SSL Certificate
* 99.95% Uptime Guarantee
* 1-Click App Installer
* Free Daily Backups
* 24/7/365 Support
Price : **2$ / Month**

Normal Plan

* 5GB Storage
* 150GB Bandwidth
* 100% NVMe Disk
* Unlimited Email Accounts
* Unlimited FTP Accounts
* Unlimited Databases
* Unlimited Hosted Domain
* Free SSL Certificate
* 99.95% Uptime Guarantee
* 1-Click App Installer
* Free Daily Backups
* 24/7/365 Support
Price : **4$ / Month**

Business Plan

* Unlimited Storage
* Unlimited Bandwidth
* 100% NVMe Disk
* Unlimited Email Accounts
* Unlimited FTP Accounts
* Unlimited Databases
* Unlimited Hosted Domain
* Free SSL Certificate
* 99.95% Uptime Guarantee
* 1-Click App Installer
* Free Daily Backups
* 24/7/365 Support
Price : **6$ / Month**

More info here : https://www.vingo-host.com

Our live chat is available 24/7 to answer your questions.

* Our payment methods are : **PayPal / PerfectMoney / CryptoCurrencies / Vodafone Cash**

**Unlimited** word means fair usage and not the overuse of space and bandwidth.
